The feasibility of the HFST toolkit has been demonstrated by full-fledged open source implementations of Finnish, Swedish, English, French and Northern Sámi lexicons.;2014-07-30;toolService;http://hdl.handle.net/11372/LRT-1301;downloadable_files_count: 0;Finland;University of Helsinki
name: 1f691060-7c3d-50dd-a6af-1b45e34d996c
notes: The Helsinki Finite-State Transducer software is intended for the implementation of morphological analysers and other tools which are based on weighted and unweigted finite-state transducer technology. The feasibility of the HFST toolkit has been demonstrated by full-fledged open source implementations of Finnish, Swedish, English, French and Northern Sámi lexicons.
title: Helsinki Finite State Technology
